alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 9:04PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern El Paso County through 945 PM MDT... At 904 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Schriever AFB, or 19 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Schriever AFB, Truckton, Ellicott and Yoder. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
